resources.string: Alternatively, you can use your fingerprint.
Permission denied. This action can\'t be complete.
Remove all advertising in Facebook news feed
Are you sure want to close Maki?
If you forget your pin, please clear Maki data from your phone\'s application manager.
Tap \"View Full Size\" to download or view image.
Tap and hold an image on a list to save or share it.
Dark theme will be automatically enabled at night
Are you sure you would like to log out of Maki?
Create a shortcut to Messages on the home screen
Create a shortcut to Notifications on the home screen
Create a shortcut to Twitter on the home screen
Create a shortcut to Instagram on the home screen
Tap the \u2713 to select this directory.
Use Facebook Messenger App instead of built-in Messenger
Unfortunately, Maki has stopped. Please tap OK to send this report via email.
You can leave comments about this crash here:
Pin your favorite pages here for faster access.
Choose which social media you want to run first
Save power and use Facebook longer
Are you sure you would like to remove
from your favorites? This action can\'t be undone.
What do you think about Maki? Rate this app here:
Please, contact us and tell what do you do not like in Maki. Thank you!
It\'s time to make Maki even better with Plus version - remove advertising, create shortcuts, enable auto night theme and support developers.
New era of Facebook on Android
Maki works faster than any Facebook app you can find on Play Store
Just all that you need - nothing more
Thank you very much! Please, restart the app to start using all new features of Maki Plus.
It\'s time to make Maki better with
Disable all advertising from Facebook on your news feed. Incredible.
Dark theme will be enabled automatically in chosen time. Awesome.
Use Maki faster - create shortcuts for messages and notifications on the home screen. And get access to Facebook everywhere with QuickBar. Marvelous.
Every Maki Plus buying makes Maki better - it\'s a great motivation for me!
Show navigation tab on the top

Thank you very much for supporting us! Unfortunately, it seems that you have some problems with the purchase. Well, this page created just for you to solve this problem. 

 We have a few possible solutions:

 1) Restart Maki. Just close an application and launch it from scratch, open settings and try to enable any Plus feature. 

 2) If the first solution doesn't work - try to click on "Buy Maki Plus" again. This action will restore your purchase (you won't spend your money again, don't worry). After that restart application and try to enable any Plus feature. 

 3) After all, if nothing of this doesn't work - contact us! We will definitely find the best solution together. 

 Our email: makifeedback@gmail.com
 Facebook page: m.facebook.com/sunshineappsst 

 With best regards, Sunshine Apps

Thank you very much for improving Maki!
Choose start and end time of automatic night theme
Save your messages and access them without internet connection

What's new? 

 1) Fixed crash on launching
 2) Improved Power saving mode: quickly switch between Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram
 
 Thank you very much for using Maki!

 Feedback: makifeedback@gmail.com or m.facebook.com/sunshineappsst/
Confirm button is only for multi choice lists. You must call setMultiChoiceItems first
You must call method setView before calling configureView.
Mozilla/5.0 (BB10; Kbd) AppleWebKit/537.10+ (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/10.1.0.4633 Mobile Safari/537.10+

Thank you very much for using Maki. Sorry, but Instagram in Maki doesn\'t support direct messages at this moment due to limitations of Instagram itself. We just need to wait until Instagram developers will add DM. Thank you!
Disable or enable additional social medias in the left slider
New era of social medias on your phone
You are not connected to the Internet
You have turned on the airplane mode.
Our mission is quite simple - make use of social medias more comfortable and easier for everyone
Additional settings. Choose time interval, set up sounds, LED and vibration.
Write a new word to block
List of words to block the notifications
Reduce the notification delay. Isn\'t battery friendly
Also when you are on the main screen of the app.
Sorry, but Facebook doesn\'t allow you to share simple text at this moment - only links!
Enter font size in a range from 50 to 300 %
Tap and hold an image to share or save it
Thank you very much for improving Maki!
